attributes.review: Now I’m here to say that my opinion may not effect this app but it will be heard. This app is terrible it take forever to download and then after it downloads it lags so bad. There are some people saying that it’s minors joking around trying to get the app removed. I say that it’s just the fact that it’s a terrible app and y’all are trying to cover that up. Now weather the app is removed or not is completely up to you but I say that this app is just terrible and needs to be deleted from the App Store.
attributes.title: This is just a terrible app

attributes.review: This app is the definition of ignorance. I do not want to put in my new mobile number or email or anything because it doesn’t tell me what he will do with it. This app took up to a month to download. Me and all my friends got it but it downloaded at different times for all of us when we were together. TRUMP is trying to ban Tik Tok because it “STEALS DATA” you tell me if we’re still in quarantine. You tell me if we will go to pressed if we don’t have Tik Tok. You tell me if this app is good or not. P.S. Its really not.
attributes.title: I forgot some Xanax but I’m to late to fix it.

attributes.review:
terrible service! 😭 i was in the middle of washing the laundry 🧺 and folding the dishes🍴and out of nowhere 😱 one of troompa loompa’s pet oranges 🍊 knocked on my door 🚪 —  i opened the door 🚪 just to be shot 🔫 square in the face while the orange laughed 😹 maniacally and robbed me! 😡 i called to complain 🤬 afterwards but then they insulted 😑my dead grandmother, 👵 imogen. she overheard 🧏🏻‍♂️and has not stopped 🚫 crying 😭 since! i will NOT be eating 🍴here again 🔁 and i recommend you 🙅🏼‍♀️ dont either!!! ❌

so in conclusion,,, if you use this app you will die 😵and your DEAD grandma 👵 will end up crying 😢
attributes.title: 😤this😹app😔killed😖me😡

Also when I got the app LAUV😡LAUV🥴BY LAUV😫LAUV😄LAUV🤨LAURV🤩BY LAUUV😭 and I got scared because I that makes my belly button grow to a point that I can fit a cup in it. And then People😌love🧃that✨i🧸hate⛓myself👩🏻i👣climbed👛out🦋of🌸my🌼head🌙and🌶watched👁myself🦈implode🐡a🕷thought🛷without📞a🖤body🔰and the it happened my beans stood up and left then my cat ate it plus its a bad app in general I don’t want to put my personal information on there I get scared that someone might hack it also BLM and LGBTQ+ rights🤪😆.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: DONT download this app😡this app is terrible I downloaded it cuz I wanted to support are orange god right when i opened that app I saw the orange god and his Cheeto bright stain self melted my eyes his uglyness and orange face was to much for my virgin eyes to Handel😭the was no warning ⚠️ on the app when my eyes melted it made a puddle in the ground and I drown my phone and it SHATTERED my dog came in my room and started licking my melding eye balls off the floor I was was literally blind and I had to get surgery which was SUPER EXPENSIVE😭so DONT download this app this app is worth a 0 star but I can’t give it one so this app is a one star😤
attributes.title: Orange Cheeto god

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this treacherous app, it ruined my phone! For starters, it took over a week to install, and once it did it glitched my phone! I began seeing stars and my screen began to turn red! It took forever to finally get on the app, and once I did it only got WORSE. It began to lag my calls, texts and I couldn’t download anymore apps! This app did not make America great again, and made my phone WORSE again. No satisfaction, this app doesn’t even deserve the star I gave it!!! -5/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: This is a horrible app!😿💔

attributes.review: This app is horrible just like the person on the front cover !!!!!as soon as I opened the app I immediately got sick to my stomach !!i guess the color orange makes me sick 😬!the only good thing about this app is that you are able to delete it off of your device ...I wasn’t able to give it a zero star so one will have to do. Orange just doesn’t look right on certain people ... it just so happens that it didn’t look right on the person on the app! Stay as far away from this app as possible !!!!
attributes.title: This App Is Horrible !!

attributes.review: Such a horrible app, doesn’t even work the eighth way. I don’t recommend it at all. It made my phone so laggy and it would give me adds outside the app. I was really confused on why my percentage would god down so quickly too, and it has to be the app. My phone is now so slow, my cousin had downloaded this app to but she was having the same problems as I was having so I’m taking the time to tell you shouldn’t get this app. I don’t recommend it at all. But that’s it, have a great day!
attributes.title: This app makes my phone not work!!

attributes.review: When I opened this app it started to play a weird vibrating sound and the next thing I know there’s a demon on the couch next to me and I couldn’t move. the app then started to play a video of Donald Trump laughing and saying that I was going to die, luckily I was able to move and get out of the app and the demon disappeared. I am still terrified that the demon will come back but in the meantime i decided to write this review to make sure this doesn’t happen to other people. overall a horrible app, did not have a fun time.
attributes.title: this app is horrible

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it asked for my phone number and other personal information and immediately began spamming my with bs notifications and kept asking me to donate to this racist clown. I am absolutely disgusted with this app. My phone is glitching so bad from the app I’m having to write this review on my iPad😡😡will absolutely never download this cult bs app EVER again. It’s so crazy his campaign is asking for donations when the just got a multi million dollar loan🤔 make it make sense!!! He doesn’t even care about the people. Get this racist out of office.
attributes.title: BS😡😡😡
